post.title: HTTP 缓存  Cache-Control
post.body:
## Cache-Control

- [浅谈http中的Cache-Control](http://www.xiaoxiaoguo.cn/protocol/http-Cache-Control.html#%E5%89%8D%E8%A8%80)

- [缓存头Cache-Control的含义和使用](https://juejin.cn/post/6844903683046506504)
- [Nginx下关于缓存控制字段cache-control的配置说明 - 运维小结](https://www.cnblogs.com/kevingrace/p/10459429.html)
- [HTTP 缓存](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTTP/Caching)
